statements: SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_budget > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM projects ORDER BY project_budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM projects WHERE project_budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_budget FROM projects WHERE project_budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%marketing%';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_budget, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM Project WHERE project_budget > 10000;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM Project JOIN Expense ON Project.project_id = Expense.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM Project JOIN Expense ON Project.project_id = Expense.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING avg_expense > 5000;
SELECT project_name, MAX(expense_amount) AS highest_expense FROM Project JOIN Expense ON Project.project_id = Expense.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY highest_expense DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_budget FROM Project WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM Project ORDER BY project_budget DESC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM Expense GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 1000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM Project JOIN Expense ON Project.project_id = Expense.project_id WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_id, project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM Project LEFT JOIN Expense ON Project.project_id = Expense.project_id GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses JOIN projects ON expenses.project_id = projects.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Engineering%';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT p.project_name, e.amount FROM projects p JOIN expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id WHERE e.amount > 5000
SELECT MIN(amount), MAX(amount), AVG(amount) FROM transactions
SELECT project_name, budget FROM Projects
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocations WHERE allocation_amount > 1000
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500
SELECT employee_name, salary, position FROM Employees
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE budget >= 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM Projects WHERE budget < 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM Projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY project_name;

SELECT project_name, expense_type, expense_amount FROM Projects JOIN Expenses ON Projects.project_id = Expenses.project_id WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' AND expense_amount > 500 ORDER BY project_name, expense_amount DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position, salary FROM Employees WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY salary DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE budget < 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, category_name, allocation_amount FROM projects JOIN project_categories USING (project_id) JOIN categories USING (category_id) JOIN budget_allocations USING (project_id, category_id);
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT project_name, category_name, SUM(allocation_amount) AS total_allocation FROM projects JOIN project_categories USING (project_id) JOIN categories USING (category_id) JOIN budget_allocations USING (project_id, category_id) GROUP BY project_name, category_name ORDER BY total_allocation DESC;
